text: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience.
author: Guy Kawasaki

text: Patience has its limits, take it too far and it's cowardice.
author: Holbrook Jackson

text: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

text: When I was 20, I thought I was 30 - but I was so far from it. When you're young, you want everything to happen now. As you mature, you can look back and see all the great things you achieved with time and patience.
author: Elisha Cuthbert

text: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance.
author: Franklin P. Jones
